alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 02 at 3:19AM PST until March 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Strongest in the foothills. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Lake Casitas. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
